content.title: Kenya Airways US flights down to 5 a week - Daily Nation
content.desc: Kenya Airways #ticker:KQ has reduced the number of flights on the newly launched New York route from the current seven to five a week effective January 15.

content.title: KQ puts off direct flights to Mogadishu indefinitely - Daily Nation
content.desc: Kenya Airways has postponed the launch of its direct flight from Nairobi's Jomo Kenyatta International Airport (JKIA) to the Somali capital Mogadishu indefinitely.

content.title: KQ to open more routes to woo tourists - Standard Digital
content.desc: Kenya will continue opening more airline routes globally to woo for more foreign investors.

content.title: Kenya Airways flight to US reduced to five times a week from seven - standardmedia.co.ke
content.desc: Kenya Airways will from next year scale down its daily flights between Nairobi to New York from seven times a week to five.
